https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/5X4na5LtIhfPr2BcOZQtP0xzR0H.jpg Namson Lau is a ballroom dancing instructor. On stage, he is a refined and suave gentleman, but in reality, he is cunning and greedy, and dancing has become a mean to strike fortune for him, without any other levels of significance. Dance of a Dream
